topic.title: How to clone a zite that does not have the clone option?
topic.body:
Some zites do not have the option to clone from the ZeroHello page.
Is there a way to clone/copy such zite?

Also is it possible to attach screenshots in posts here on ZeroTalk?

1588509892_1DqoTdKahV2n33nmgMaqEzw8BGRX6.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_1367_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): You can create a new site, open the site's sidebar and click OPEN SITE DIRECTORY and then open the original's site directory the same way. Then just copy the files to your new site. Make sure to remove user data and maybe databases.

Thanks for the reply. It pointed me in the right direction to copy the site and move its content to newly created site.
The key was to edit the `content.json`.

This is the site i tested cloning.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1yUji4qPD7GAog8XkP3EDMEfrL995S4Xd/

Found a useful site that describes the basics.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/DevCenter.bit/?/tutorials/static_zite
